      public boolean login()
      Controls the login function and check the correctness of account and password.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating whether the login is successful.

    • promptForPassword

      Prompting users for password.
      Returns:
      A String containing login information.

    • checkPassword

      public boolean checkPassword​(String acc, String password)
      Checking the entered password.
      Parameters:
      acc - the login account
      password - the password for checking
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating whether the password is correct.

    • readInfo

      public String[] readInfo​(String account, int col)
      Read information of the account.
      Parameters:
      account - the account to read for
      col - the col where account appears
      Returns:
      A String containing account information.

    • hash

      public String hash​(String password, byte[] salt)
      Helper methods for hashing. Hash password to check whether it is correct.
      Parameters:
      password - the password to be hashed
      salt - the byte array salt
      Returns:
      A String containing generated password using hashing.

    • byteArrToHexStr

      public String byteArrToHexStr​(byte[] bytes)
      Convert byte array to hexadecimal string. Used by hash(String password, byte[] salt) to convert password into hexadecimal. Hashed password is changed to hexadecimal form.
      Parameters:
      bytes - bytes array to be converted
      Returns:
      A String containing converted password in hexadecimal.

    • hexStrToByteArr

      public byte[] hexStrToByteArr​(String hex)
      Convert hexadecimal string to byte array. Used by checkPassword(String acc, String password) to convert password into byte. Hashed password is changed to byte form.
      Parameters:
      hex - hexadecimal array to be converted
      Returns:
      An Array containing converted password in byte.

    • getSalt

      public byte[] getSalt()
      Gets random salt in SHA1
      Returns:
      byte array salt

    • checkVacancy

      public void checkVacancy​(Set<Index> indexes)
      Both students and admin can check vacancy for indexes.
      Parameters:
      indexes - A Set containing all the current indexes.
